## descriptive statistics

### 데이터 분류

1. 범주형 데이터
    - 명목형 데이터
    - 순서형 데이터
2. 수치형 데이터
    - 이산형 데이터
    - 연속형 데이터

### basic statistics

1. 중심 경향성
    - 평균
    - 중앙값
    - 최빈값
2. 산포도
    - 분산
    - 표준편차
    - IQR
    - 변동계수
3. 분포도
    - 왜도
    - 첨도
    - 백분위수
    - 박스플롯




::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
c <- chickwts
tapply(c$weight, c$feed, max)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
   casein horsebean   linseed  meatmeal   soybean sunflower 
      404       227       309       380       329       423 
```


:::

```{.r .cell-code}
round(table(c$feed) / nrow(c), 3)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```

   casein horsebean   linseed  meatmeal   soybean sunflower 
    0.169     0.141     0.169     0.155     0.197     0.169 
```


:::

```{.r .cell-code}
sum(c$feed == "horsebean")
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
[1] 10
```


:::
:::



## bar plot



::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
car.tab = table(mtcars$carb)
barplot(car.tab)
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](3_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-2-1.png){width=672}
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
carb.mat = table(mtcars$carb, mtcars$am)
barplot(carb.mat, beside = T)
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](3_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-2-2.png){width=672}
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
par(mfrow = c(2, 2))
boxplot(mtcars$mpg, main = "mpg")
boxplot(mtcars$mpg, mtcars$am, main = "mpg by am")
boxplot(mtcars$mpg, mtcars$am, mtcars$gear, main = "mpg by am and gear")
boxplot(mtcars$mpg, mtcars$am, mtcars$gear, mtcars$carb, main = "mpg by am, gear, and carb")
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](3_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-2-3.png){width=672}
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
plot(mtcars$mpg, mtcars$wt, main = "mpg by wt")
points(mtcars$mpg, mtcars$wt, pch = mtcars$am + 1)
pairs(mtcars)
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](3_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-2-4.png){width=672}
:::

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](3_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-2-5.png){width=672}
:::
:::



## sampling



::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
sample(1:20, 10, replace=T)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
 [1]  9  8  5 10 18 18  1 10 19 10
```


:::

```{.r .cell-code}
sample(c('H', 'T'), 10, replace=T, prob=c(0.3, 0.7))
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
 [1] "T" "H" "H" "H" "T" "T" "H" "H" "T" "T"
```


:::

```{.r .cell-code}
par(mfrow=c(2,2))
for (i in c(100, 1000, 10000, 100000)) {
  x <- sample(1:6, i, replace=T)
  x.tab <- table(x)
  barplot(x.tab / i, ylim=c(0, 0.5), xlab=paste("n=", i))
}
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](3_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-3-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::
